Before she can act on it, however, the gang finds her
and snatches her away once again.
jpnChrName: ところがある時、 【ミシェル】がギャングに誘拐されてしまう。
jpnSearchText:
ところがある時、
【ミシェル】がギャングに誘拐されてしまう。

engChrName: Fueled by the fires of rage, Ron rushes into their hideout and engages the gangsters in a gunfight. He emerges victorious by the skin of his teeth.
engSearchText:
Fueled by the fires of rage, Ron rushes into their
hideout and engages the gangsters in a gunfight.
He emerges victorious by the skin of his teeth.
jpnChrName: 【ロン】は単身で彼らの拠点に乗り込み、 銃撃戦を繰り広げた末……辛くも制圧。
jpnSearchText:
【ロン】は単身で彼らの拠点に乗り込み、
銃撃戦を繰り広げた末……辛くも制圧。

engChrName: He rescues Michelle from her captivity and the two embrace each other at last—overjoyed to have made it out alive.
engSearchText:
He rescues Michelle from her captivity and the two
embrace each other at last—overjoyed to have made it
out alive.
jpnChrName: 捕らわれていた【ミシェル】を助け出し、 互いの無事を喜ぶ２人。
jpnSearchText:
捕らわれていた【ミシェル】を助け出し、
互いの無事を喜ぶ２人。

engChrName: And it was at that moment when one of the fallen gangsters lifted his quivering hand and pulled the trigger...
engSearchText:
And it was at that moment when one of the fallen
gangsters lifted his quivering hand and pulled
the trigger...
jpnChrName: その時、不意に起き上がった１人の構成員が 拳銃を手に取った──
jpnSearchText:
その時、不意に起き上がった１人の構成員が
拳銃を手に取った──

engChrName: Michelle! Hold on!
engSearchText: Michelle! Hold on!
jpnChrName: ミシェル！　しっかりしろッ……！
jpnSearchText: ミシェル！　しっかりしろッ……！

engChrName: Ron... Are you...?
engSearchText: Ron... Are you...?
jpnChrName: ロンさん……わたし……
jpnSearchText: ロンさん……わたし……

engChrName: Are you all right? You're not hurt, are you?
engSearchText: Are you all right? You're not hurt, are you?
jpnChrName: あなたの事、ちゃんと守れた……？
jpnSearchText: あなたの事、ちゃんと守れた……？

engChrName: I'm fine! See—not a single scratch on me.
engSearchText: I'm fine! See—not a single scratch on me.
jpnChrName: ああ、かすり傷１つ無いさ……
jpnSearchText: ああ、かすり傷１つ無いさ……

engChrName: Thank goodness... I fulfilled my promise, then. You remember it, right?
engSearchText:
Thank goodness... I fulfilled my promise, then.
You remember it, right?
jpnChrName: 良かった…… 前に、約束したでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
良かった……
前に、約束したでしょう？

engChrName: 'You're always protecting everyone, so one day, I'll be the one who protects you...'
engSearchText:
'You're always protecting everyone, so one day, I'll be
the one who protects you...'
jpnChrName: 『ロンさんがみんなを守る人なら   わたしがロンさんを守る』って……
jpnSearchText:
『ロンさんがみんなを守る人なら
わたしがロンさんを守る』って……

engChrName: Of course I remember! Save your strength, Michelle. Help will arrive at any moment!
engSearchText:
Of course I remember! Save your strength, Michelle.
Help will arrive at any moment!
jpnChrName: 覚えてる……覚えてるとも。 だからそれ以上喋るな……
jpnSearchText:
覚えてる……覚えてるとも。
だからそれ以上喋るな……

engChrName: Hey! Over here! I need a medic NOW!
engSearchText: Hey! Over here! I need a medic NOW!
jpnChrName: おい、こっちだッ！！ ここに重傷者がいるッ……！！
jpnSearchText:
おい、こっちだッ！！
ここに重傷者がいるッ……！！

engChrName: Ron... Your arms are so...warm.
engSearchText: Ron... Your arms are so...warm.
jpnChrName: ロンさんの腕の中、温かいなァ……
jpnSearchText: ロンさんの腕の中、温かいなァ……

engChrName: When you hold me like this, my fear just... melts away...
engSearchText:
When you hold me like this, my fear just...
melts away...
jpnChrName: これならわたし、何も怖くないよ──
jpnSearchText: これならわたし、何も怖くないよ──

engChrName: Lily is an actress whose career has spanned two decades.
engSearchText:
Lily is an actress whose career has spanned
two decades.
jpnChrName: 主人公【リリー】は、芸歴２０年の女優。
jpnSearchText: <C1>主人公【リリー】は、芸歴２０年の女優。

engChrName: Despite her grueling schedule—and the ceaseless pressure that comes with the job—she finds great meaning in her work.
engSearchText:
Despite her grueling schedule—and the ceaseless
pressure that comes with the job—she finds great
meaning in her work.
jpnChrName: 出演作が途切れず忙しい日々を送る中で、 【リリー】はプレッシャーを抱えながらも １つの充足感を得ていた。
jpnSearchText:
出演作が途切れず忙しい日々を送る中で、
【リリー】はプレッシャーを抱えながらも
１つの充足感を得ていた。

engChrName: She derives satisfaction from the process of transforming into another person. Into someone who isn't her.
engSearchText:
She derives satisfaction from the process of
transforming into another person. Into someone who
isn't her.
jpnChrName: “自分じゃない誰かになる”ことで得たその充足感は 彼女をさらに仕事へと駆り立てると共に──
jpnSearchText:
“自分じゃない誰かになる”ことで得たその充足感は
彼女をさらに仕事へと駆り立てると共に──

engChrName: And that feeling pushes her further and further into her career. She is utterly consumed by it. Inebriated by it.
engSearchText:
And that feeling pushes her further and further into
her career. She is utterly consumed by it.
Inebriated by it.
jpnChrName: 体の内側がじわじわと熱くなるような ある種の“酔い”を味わわせた。
jpnSearchText:
体の内側がじわじわと熱くなるような
ある種の“酔い”を味わわせた。

engChrName: And that inebriation gives rise to something new.
engSearchText: And that inebriation gives rise to something new.
jpnChrName: そして、その“酔い”が生み出したのか……
jpnSearchText: <C1>そして、その“酔い”が生み出したのか……

engChrName: One day, Lily began to hear a voice inside her head. A voice from another version of herself.
engSearchText:
One day, Lily began to hear a voice inside her head.
A voice from another version of herself.
jpnChrName: いつからか【リリー】は “別の自分の声”が聞こえるようになる。
jpnSearchText:
いつからか【リリー】は
“別の自分の声”が聞こえるようになる。

engChrName: And this is but one of many conversations between the 'two.'
engSearchText:
And this is but one of many conversations between
the 'two.'
jpnChrName: 今日もまた、彼女たちの会話が始まるのだった──
jpnSearchText: 今日もまた、彼女たちの会話が始まるのだった──

engChrName: ...You have GOT to be kidding me. They passed me over for her?
engSearchText:
...You have GOT to be kidding me. They passed me
over for her?
jpnChrName: ──あの子、私が落ちたオーディションに 受かったんですって？
jpnSearchText:
──あの子、私が落ちたオーディションに
受かったんですって？

engChrName: Who does that little minx think she is? She gets roles left and right, and yet her acting is garbage.
engSearchText:
Who does that little minx think she is? She gets roles
left and right, and yet her acting is garbage.
jpnChrName: 生意気ね、ちょっと人気が出たからって。 大して演技も上手くないのに。
jpnSearchText:
生意気ね、ちょっと人気が出たからって。
大して演技も上手くないのに。

engChrName: Why do you spend so much time obsessing over younger actresses...?
engSearchText:
Why do you spend so much time obsessing over
younger actresses...?
jpnChrName: もう、後輩相手にマウントを取って……
jpnSearchText: もう、後輩相手にマウントを取って……

engChrName: And did you really have to sleep with that producer? Isn't that going a little overboard?
engSearchText:
And did you really have to sleep with that producer?
Isn't that going a little overboard?
jpnChrName: この前はプロデューサーとホテルに…… 無理しすぎじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
この前はプロデューサーとホテルに……
無理しすぎじゃない？

engChrName: This is a dog-eat-dog industry! One night with that cretin is NOTHING if it gets me some work!
engSearchText:
This is a dog-eat-dog industry! One night with that
cretin is NOTHING if it gets me some work!
jpnChrName: ここは競争社会よ？ １回寝て仕事が増えるなら安いわ。
jpnSearchText:
ここは競争社会よ？
１回寝て仕事が増えるなら安いわ。

engChrName: This is getting us nowhere... I'm so tired of all this.
engSearchText: This is getting us nowhere... I'm so tired of all this.
jpnChrName: そうだけど……少し疲れてきたの。
jpnSearchText: そうだけど……少し疲れてきたの。

engChrName: I just want to get away. I'll go back to the old me and—
engSearchText:
I just want to get away. I'll go back to the old me
and—
jpnChrName: この世界から離れて 普通の自分に戻っても──
jpnSearchText:
この世界から離れて
普通の自分に戻っても──

engChrName: Okay, then answer me this. Which of us is the 'old' you?
engSearchText:
Okay, then answer me this. Which of us is the
'old' you?
jpnChrName: じゃあ聞くけど。 “どんな自分に”戻るっていうの？
jpnSearchText:
じゃあ聞くけど。
“どんな自分に”戻るっていうの？

engChrName: Whenever that question is posed, their arguments end on the spot.
engSearchText:
Whenever that question is posed, their arguments end
on the spot.
jpnChrName: ──その問いが出ると いつも彼女たちの会話は終わる。
jpnSearchText:
──その問いが出ると
いつも彼女たちの会話は終わる。

engChrName: Mirror, mirror on the wall. Who is real, and who's the thrall?
engSearchText:
Mirror, mirror on the wall.
Who is real, and who's the thrall?
jpnChrName: 鏡よ、鏡── 本当の私は、誰……？
jpnSearchText:
鏡よ、鏡──
本当の私は、誰……？

engChrName: Sheena Dirke was the leader of the Calvardian Revolution and the cornerstone of the newly-founded Calvard Republic.
engSearchText:
Sheena Dirke was the leader of the Calvardian
Revolution and the cornerstone of the newly-founded
Calvard Republic.
jpnChrName: 《カルバード革命》を成し遂げ、 共和国の礎を築いた【シーナ・ディルク】。
jpnSearchText:
《カルバード革命》を成し遂げ、
共和国の礎を築いた【シーナ・ディルク】。

engChrName: Despite her youth, Dirke commanded the attention of the nation—her unyielding patriotism resonated with the citizens of every class and background.
engSearchText:
Despite her youth, Dirke commanded the attention
of the nation—her unyielding patriotism resonated
with the citizens of every class and background.
jpnChrName: 一介の女学生でしかなかった【シーナ】だが、 祖国を憂う彼女の揺るぎない決意に 身分や人種を問わず多くの者が共鳴。
jpnSearchText:
一介の女学生でしかなかった【シーナ】だが、
祖国を憂う彼女の揺るぎない決意に
身分や人種を問わず多くの者が共鳴。

engChrName: She quickly rose to fame alongside her comrades: Atkinson, a former general of the Royal Army; Auguste, a philosopher; and Aramis, an artist.
engSearchText:
She quickly rose to fame alongside her comrades:
Atkinson, a former general of the Royal Army;
Auguste, a philosopher; and Aramis, an artist.
jpnChrName: 元王国軍の青年将校【アトキンソン】や 思想家【オーギュスト】、芸術家【アラミス】といった 一癖ありながらも頼もしき同志を率いる立場となる。
jpnSearchText:
元王国軍の青年将校【アトキンソン】や
思想家【オーギュスト】、芸術家【アラミス】といった
一癖ありながらも頼もしき同志を率いる立場となる。

engChrName: Together, these four heroes weaved their way through the tumult of their time, all the while carving a path for a better tomorrow.
engSearchText:
Together, these four heroes weaved their way through
the tumult of their time, all the while carving a path
for a better tomorrow.
jpnChrName: そして、激動の世を駆ける彼女たちはいよいよ──
jpnSearchText: <C1>そして、激動の世を駆ける彼女たちはいよいよ──

engChrName: Their efforts culminated in the Battle of Edith— igniting the flames of the Calvardian Revolution.
engSearchText:
Their efforts culminated in the Battle of Edith—
igniting the flames of the Calvardian Revolution.
jpnChrName: 《カルバード革命》の始まりである “イーディス市街戦”当日を迎えるのだった。
jpnSearchText:
《カルバード革命》の始まりである
“イーディス市街戦”当日を迎えるのだった。

engChrName: May 1100 of the Septian Calendar. Five minutes before the start of the Battle of Edith.
engSearchText:
May 1100 of the Septian Calendar. Five minutes
before the start of the Battle of Edith.
jpnChrName: 七耀歴１１００年５月── イーディス市街戦開始、５分前。
jpnSearchText:
七耀歴１１００年５月──
イーディス市街戦開始、５分前。

engChrName: ...My body won't stop shaking.
engSearchText: ...My body won't stop shaking.
jpnChrName: ……体の震えが止まらないや。
jpnSearchText: ……体の震えが止まらないや。

engChrName: I thought I made my peace with death long ago, but I guess I haven't...
engSearchText:
I thought I made my peace with death long ago, but I
guess I haven't...
jpnChrName: 死ぬ事は、とっくに覚悟してたのに。
jpnSearchText: 死ぬ事は、とっくに覚悟してたのに。

engChrName: And even now, I'm racked with doubt. Can we really change the history of an entire country?
engSearchText:
And even now, I'm racked with doubt. Can we really
change the history of an entire country?
jpnChrName: できるのかな…… “国の歴史を変える”なんて。
jpnSearchText:
できるのかな……
“国の歴史を変える”なんて。

engChrName: Of course we can, Sheena. The victors are free to write the history books however they please.
engSearchText:
Of course we can, Sheena. The victors are free to
write the history books however they please.
jpnChrName: いいや、シーナ。 正確には“勝者が歴史を作る”んだ。
jpnSearchText:
いいや、シーナ。
正確には“勝者が歴史を作る”んだ。

engChrName: Once we toss the tomes of the ancient regime, we'll write a new history—one that is centered on the people of this country.
engSearchText:
Once we toss the tomes of the ancient regime,
we'll write a new history—one that is centered on the
people of this country.
jpnChrName: 時代遅れの旧体制（アンシャン・レジーム）の代わりに、 本来在るべき“人民が主体となる歴史”をね。
jpnSearchText:
時代遅れの旧体制（アンシャン・レジーム）の代わりに、
本来在るべき“人民が主体となる歴史”をね。

engChrName: ...You're right as always. Victory is our only path forward.
engSearchText:
...You're right as always. Victory is our only
path forward.
jpnChrName: ……そうだね、勝利しか道はない。
jpnSearchText: ……そうだね、勝利しか道はない。

engChrName: The Revolutionary Army is now at your beck and call. They're awaiting your orders, Commander Dirke.
engSearchText:
The Revolutionary Army is now at your beck and call.
They're awaiting your orders, Commander Dirke.
jpnChrName: 革命解放軍の士気は充分── 最後に、総司令殿の号令を賜ろうか。
jpnSearchText:
革命解放軍の士気は充分──
最後に、総司令殿の号令を賜ろうか。

engChrName: It's time for the dawn of a new era for our homeland!
engSearchText: It's time for the dawn of a new era for our homeland!
jpnChrName: 行こう！　祖国の夜明けを迎えに！
jpnSearchText: 行こう！　祖国の夜明けを迎えに！

engChrName: Let us seize the future with our own hands!
engSearchText: Let us seize the future with our own hands!
jpnChrName: 我らが明日を、この手に！！
jpnSearchText: 我らが明日を、この手に！！

engChrName: Phillip, a young, fledgling Z1 racecar driver, is the son of Lewis Adler—the legendary racer.
engSearchText:
Phillip, a young, fledgling Z1 racecar driver, is the
son of Lewis Adler—the legendary racer.
jpnChrName: Ｚ１の若手レーサーである主人公【フィリップ】は 伝説と言われたレーサー【ルイス】を父に持つ。
jpnSearchText:
Ｚ１の若手レーサーである主人公【フィリップ】は
伝説と言われたレーサー【ルイス】を父に持つ。

engChrName: Tormented by the crushing weight of his father's legacy, Phillip rebels against him—shattering the bond they held in the process.
engSearchText:
Tormented by the crushing weight of his father's
legacy, Phillip rebels against him—shattering the
bond they held in the process.
jpnChrName: 偉大すぎる父を持つが故に苦労した【フィリップ】は 父に強く反発し、仲違いしてしまう。
jpnSearchText:
偉大すぎる父を持つが故に苦労した【フィリップ】は
父に強く反発し、仲違いしてしまう。

engChrName: Shortly thereafter, Lewis gets into an accident—and perishes on the spot.
engSearchText:
Shortly thereafter, Lewis gets into an accident—and
perishes on the spot.
jpnChrName: その矢先、【ルイス】は事故に遭いこの世を去った。
jpnSearchText: <C1>その矢先、【ルイス】は事故に遭いこの世を去った。

engChrName: With little time to process the untimely death of his father, Phillip is thrust into the Grand Prix—his focus fractured and his will dwindling.
engSearchText:
With little time to process the untimely death of his
father, Phillip is thrust into the Grand Prix—his focus
fractured and his will dwindling.
jpnChrName: 気持ちの整理をつけられないまま グランプリに出走した【フィリップ】──
jpnSearchText:
気持ちの整理をつけられないまま
グランプリに出走した【フィリップ】──

engChrName: But then, in the final lap of the race—when all hope of victory was nearly lost—the words of his father echo in Phillip's mind.
engSearchText:
But then, in the final lap of the race—when all hope
of victory was nearly lost—the words of his father
echo in Phillip's mind.
jpnChrName: レース終盤、彼が思い出したのは父の言葉だった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>レース終盤、彼が思い出したのは父の言葉だった。

engChrName: The thing you gotta aim for ain't the finish line. You're gonna have to think way beyond that.
engSearchText:
The thing you gotta aim for ain't the finish line.
You're gonna have to think way beyond that.
jpnChrName: いつだって目指すべきはゴールじゃない、 その“先”にあるものだ。
jpnSearchText:
いつだって目指すべきはゴールじゃない、
その“先”にあるものだ。

engChrName: If you wanna be a legend, set your sights on a goal to call your own—then speed past it.
engSearchText:
If you wanna be a legend, set your sights on a goal to
call your own—then speed past it.
jpnChrName: いつかお前にとってのそれを 見つけ出す日がきっと来るだろう。
jpnSearchText:
いつかお前にとってのそれを
見つけ出す日がきっと来るだろう。

engChrName: Unbelievable! Phillip's taken the lead! He's passed last year's champion, Max!
engSearchText:
Unbelievable! Phillip's taken the lead! He's passed last
year's champion, Max!
jpnChrName: 抜け出した！　フィリップ選手、 前大会チャンピオンのマックス選手を抜いた！
jpnSearchText:
抜け出した！　フィリップ選手、
前大会チャンピオンのマックス選手を抜いた！

engChrName: Look at that little Leno of his go! Something's really lit a fire in him! Nothing's gonna stop him now!
engSearchText:
Look at that little Leno of his go! Something's really
lit a fire in him! Nothing's gonna stop him now!
jpnChrName: 先頭を行く弱小ワークス・レノ！ ──勢いは火が点いたように止まらない！
jpnSearchText:
先頭を行く弱小ワークス・レノ！
──勢いは火が点いたように止まらない！

engChrName: Ha. That little punk didn't even spare me a second thought! Who on earth is that kid racing here?
engSearchText:
Ha. That little punk didn't even spare me a
second thought! Who on earth is that kid racing here?
jpnChrName: ハハ、俺のことは眼中に無しか……！ あいつは一体、何を見ているんだ！？
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、俺のことは眼中に無しか……！
あいつは一体、何を見ているんだ！？

engChrName: I found it, Dad. I found my goal beyond the finish line.
engSearchText:
I found it, Dad. I found my goal beyond the
finish line.
jpnChrName: ──僕もやっと見つけたよ、 自分が本当に目指すべきもの。
jpnSearchText:
──僕もやっと見つけたよ、
自分が本当に目指すべきもの。

engChrName: I just wish I could have found it while you were still here...
engSearchText:
I just wish I could have found it while you were
still here...
jpnChrName: 失ってから気付くってのは 何とも皮肉なもんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
失ってから気付くってのは
何とも皮肉なもんだけど……

engChrName: I'm going to leave you in the dust, Lewis Adler!
engSearchText: I'm going to leave you in the dust, Lewis Adler!
jpnChrName: 今から貴方を超える、ルイス・アドラー！
jpnSearchText: 今から貴方を超える、ルイス・アドラー！

engChrName: I won't stop racing until I overwrite every legendary record you ever set!
engSearchText:
I won't stop racing until I overwrite every legendary
record you ever set!
jpnChrName: 伝説のレーサーのレコード、 アンタの息子が塗り替えてみせるさ！
jpnSearchText:
伝説のレーサーのレコード、
アンタの息子が塗り替えてみせるさ！

engChrName: Will, an up-and-coming stock broker, and Mia, a woman of ambition, both work at local branches of their respective trading and banking companies.
engSearchText:
Will, an up-and-coming stock broker, and Mia, a
woman of ambition, both work at local branches of
their respective trading and banking companies.
jpnChrName: 商社の地方支社に勤める若手有望株の【ウィル】と 同じく地元の有力銀行に勤める【ミア】。
jpnSearchText:
商社の地方支社に勤める若手有望株の【ウィル】と
同じく地元の有力銀行に勤める【ミア】。

engChrName: After a chance encounter in the city, the two hit it off and start dating, growing steadily closer. It seems they were destined to be together...
engSearchText:
After a chance encounter in the city, the two hit it off
and start dating, growing steadily closer. It seems they
were destined to be together...
jpnChrName: この街で偶然出会い、 成り行きのような形で付き合い始めた２人は 次第に心を通わせていった。
jpnSearchText:
この街で偶然出会い、
成り行きのような形で付き合い始めた２人は
次第に心を通わせていった。

engChrName: ...that is, until one fateful day—when their relationship reaches an unexpected turning point.
engSearchText:
...that is, until one fateful day—when their
relationship reaches an unexpected turning point.
jpnChrName: とある転機が、互いの身に訪れるまでは──
jpnSearchText: <C1>とある転機が、互いの身に訪れるまでは──

engChrName: You want to break it off? Just like that?
engSearchText: You want to break it off? Just like that?
jpnChrName: ……別れて欲しい、か。
jpnSearchText: ……別れて欲しい、か。

engChrName: Oh, come on. It was just a bit of a fling, right? Just two lonely people trying to feel less lonely for a while.
engSearchText:
Oh, come on. It was just a bit of a fling, right?
Just two lonely people trying to feel less lonely for
a while.
jpnChrName: ふふ、元々ただの遊びでしょ？ 互いの寂しさを紛らわせるための。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、元々ただの遊びでしょ？
互いの寂しさを紛らわせるための。

engChrName: I'm studying abroad and you're moving back to your main office. It's like Aidios Herself planned for us to separate.
engSearchText:
I'm studying abroad and you're moving back to your
main office. It's like Aidios Herself planned for us
to separate.
jpnChrName: 私は留学、貴方は本社に栄転。 まるで女神の計らいみたいじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
私は留学、貴方は本社に栄転。
まるで女神の計らいみたいじゃない。

engChrName: Fine. I get it. Guess this is it, then.
engSearchText: Fine. I get it. Guess this is it, then.
jpnChrName: 分かったよ…… もう何を言っても無駄みたいだ。
jpnSearchText:
分かったよ……
もう何を言っても無駄みたいだ。

engChrName: You better make those dreams of yours come true.
engSearchText: You better make those dreams of yours come true.
jpnChrName: 絶対に夢をかなえてよ、ミア。
jpnSearchText: 絶対に夢をかなえてよ、ミア。

engChrName: Of course I will! Who do you think you're talking to, hmm?
engSearchText:
Of course I will! Who do you think you're talking
to, hmm?
jpnChrName: ふふ、誰に向かって言ってるの。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、誰に向かって言ってるの。

engChrName: Haha. Yeah, I know, I know. Well... Take care, Mia.
engSearchText:
Haha. Yeah, I know, I know.
Well... Take care, Mia.
jpnChrName: はは、君なら大丈夫だよな。 ……それじゃ、元気で。
jpnSearchText:
はは、君なら大丈夫だよな。
……それじゃ、元気で。

engChrName: You take care, too, Will. Thanks for a wonderful time.
engSearchText:
You take care, too, Will. Thanks for a
wonderful time.
jpnChrName: うん、ウィルの方も。 今までありがとね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、ウィルの方も。
今までありがとね。

engChrName: ...Why'd it have to rain?
engSearchText: ...Why'd it have to rain?
jpnChrName: ……なんで雨なんか降るのよ。
jpnSearchText: ……なんで雨なんか降るのよ。

engChrName: Damn it, Will. Couldn't you tell these were tears?
engSearchText: Damn it, Will. Couldn't you tell these were tears?
jpnChrName: 気付いてよ、バカ。
jpnSearchText: 気付いてよ、バカ。

engChrName: This documentary is a dramatization of a memoir left behind by a mountain climber.
engSearchText:
This documentary is a dramatization of a memoir left
behind by a mountain climber.
jpnChrName: これは、とある登山隊の手記を映像化した ドキュメンタリー作品。
jpnSearchText:
これは、とある登山隊の手記を映像化した
ドキュメンタリー作品。

engChrName: The brutal intensity of mountaineering is laid bare against the ethereal beauty of Calvard's most famous peaks and valleys.
engSearchText:
The brutal intensity of mountaineering is laid bare
against the ethereal beauty of Calvard's most famous
peaks and valleys.
jpnChrName: カルバード共和国の美しい名峰や峡谷を紹介しつつ、 過酷な登山の模様が描かれている。
jpnSearchText:
カルバード共和国の美しい名峰や峡谷を紹介しつつ、
過酷な登山の模様が描かれている。

engChrName: The most impressive of which is the Tianshan Mountains in the eastern region of the Republic.
engSearchText:
The most impressive of which is the Tianshan
Mountains in the eastern region of the Republic.
jpnChrName: 中でも白眉と言うべきは 共和国東部に位置する《天山連峰》。
jpnSearchText:
中でも白眉と言うべきは
共和国東部に位置する《天山連峰》。

engChrName: Nicholas, the author of the memoir, serves as the narrator as the team ascends the mountain using a route that was believed to be unscalable.
engSearchText:
Nicholas, the author of the memoir, serves as the
narrator as the team ascends the mountain using a
route that was believed to be unscalable.
jpnChrName: 難攻不落の直登ルートに初登頂した時の話を 手記の著者【ニコラス】のナレーションで──
jpnSearchText:
難攻不落の直登ルートに初登頂した時の話を
手記の著者【ニコラス】のナレーションで──

engChrName: ...This isn't the first time I've gazed at the gaunt face of death.
engSearchText:
...This isn't the first time I've gazed at the gaunt face
of death.
jpnChrName: ──私自身、死を悟った事がある。
jpnSearchText: ──私自身、死を悟った事がある。

engChrName: It awaits us all at the bottom of the abyss, yearning for our fall when a boulder bars our way.
engSearchText:
It awaits us all at the bottom of the abyss, yearning
for our fall when a boulder bars our way.
jpnChrName: 大岩壁が行く手を阻む。 落ちれば死、あるのみ。
jpnSearchText:
大岩壁が行く手を阻む。
落ちれば死、あるのみ。

engChrName: I've never seen a mountain rob the hope of the climbers challenging it. That is, not before today.
engSearchText:
I've never seen a mountain rob the hope of the
climbers challenging it. That is, not before today.
jpnChrName: 実際にこの目で見て初めて 登攀（とうはん）者の希望を奪う山だと分かる。
jpnSearchText:
実際にこの目で見て初めて
登攀（とうはん）者の希望を奪う山だと分かる。

engChrName: It's been ten days since we started our ascent, yet the summit is not even in sight.
engSearchText:
It's been ten days since we started our ascent, yet the
summit is not even in sight.
jpnChrName: アタックから早１０日── 進んでいる実感が全く湧かない。
jpnSearchText:
アタックから早１０日──
進んでいる実感が全く湧かない。

engChrName: When you scale a mountain, death scales right behind you.
engSearchText:
When you scale a mountain, death scales right
behind you.
jpnChrName: 登山は常に、死と隣り合わせだ。
jpnSearchText: 登山は常に、死と隣り合わせだ。

engChrName: Ellman, Massif, and Gessner were among the greatest mountaineers in all the world. Yet even they were claimed by death while on the climb to the top.
engSearchText:
Ellman, Massif, and Gessner were among the greatest
mountaineers in all the world. Yet even they were
claimed by death while on the climb to the top.
jpnChrName: エルマン、マシフ、ゲスナー…… 偉大な登山家たちも皆山から帰らぬ人となった。
jpnSearchText:
エルマン、マシフ、ゲスナー……
偉大な登山家たちも皆山から帰らぬ人となった。

engChrName: Man is utterly powerless before the mountain. The frailty of humanity is unmasked in the face of nature's raw majesty.
engSearchText:
Man is utterly powerless before the mountain.
The frailty of humanity is unmasked in the face of
nature's raw majesty.
jpnChrName: 大自然を前にして何ができようか。 ちっぽけな、抗う力も持たぬ我々に。
jpnSearchText:
大自然を前にして何ができようか。
ちっぽけな、抗う力も持たぬ我々に。

engChrName: So, then, why does man climb the mountain?
engSearchText: So, then, why does man climb the mountain?
jpnChrName: ではなぜ、山を登るのか？
jpnSearchText: ではなぜ、山を登るのか？

engChrName: And to that I say... I do not know.
engSearchText: And to that I say... I do not know.
jpnChrName: 理由は無い。 ただ──
jpnSearchText:
理由は無い。
ただ──

engChrName: All I know is that the vast world beyond the summit has seized hold of my soul—and it will never let go.
engSearchText:
All I know is that the vast world beyond the summit
has seized hold of my soul—and it will never let go.
jpnChrName: この眩暈を催すほど巨きな世界が、 今も私の魂を捕えて離さないのだ。
jpnSearchText:
この眩暈を催すほど巨きな世界が、
今も私の魂を捕えて離さないのだ。

engChrName: Xi Sen is a handsome young man whose talent in the sword arts is unrivalled.
engSearchText:
Xi Sen is a handsome young man whose talent in the
sword arts is unrivalled.
jpnChrName: 主人公【シセン】は、剣術に長けた眉目秀麗な青年。
jpnSearchText: <C1>主人公【シセン】は、剣術に長けた眉目秀麗な青年。

engChrName: His unyielding sense of justice has driven him to conquer many an evil foe.
engSearchText:
His unyielding sense of justice has driven him to
conquer many an evil foe.
jpnChrName: その正義感の強さ故に 悪人を懲らしめることが度々あり──
jpnSearchText:
その正義感の強さ故に
悪人を懲らしめることが度々あり──

engChrName: Thanks to his skill with the sword and his elegant charms, he earned the title The Peony Blade.
engSearchText:
Thanks to his skill with the sword and his elegant
charms, he earned the title The Peony Blade.
jpnChrName: その技と見目の麗しさから、いつからか 《百花王》という呼び名がつくようになった。
jpnSearchText:
その技と見目の麗しさから、いつからか
《百花王》という呼び名がつくようになった。

engChrName: As time passes, fate begins to weave its tangled web.
engSearchText: As time passes, fate begins to weave its tangled web.
jpnChrName: そして、時と因果は巡り……
jpnSearchText: <C1>そして、時と因果は巡り……

engChrName: Xi Sen crosses blades with Tengai—a leader of a gang of bandits, a scoundrel who inflicts unspeakable cruelty on innocent villagers...
engSearchText:
Xi Sen crosses blades with Tengai—a leader of a gang
of bandits, a scoundrel who inflicts unspeakable
cruelty on innocent villagers...
jpnChrName: 無辜（むこ）の民に悪逆無道を働く凶賊の頭目──
jpnSearchText: <C1>無辜（むこ）の民に悪逆無道を働く凶賊の頭目──

engChrName: ...and a murderer who killed Xi Sen's father.
engSearchText: ...and a murderer who killed Xi Sen's father.
jpnChrName: 【シセン】の父の仇でもある【テンガイ】と ついに相対するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
【シセン】の父の仇でもある【テンガイ】と
ついに相対するのだった。

engChrName: Heh heh. Not half bad, kid.
engSearchText: Heh heh. Not half bad, kid.
jpnChrName: フフ、見事な手並みだ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、見事な手並みだ。

engChrName: You're the spitting image of your old man. You've even got those same fearless eyes.
engSearchText:
You're the spitting image of your old man.
You've even got those same fearless eyes.
jpnChrName: 恐れを知らぬ瞳── 貴様の父親を思い出す。
jpnSearchText:
恐れを知らぬ瞳──
貴様の父親を思い出す。

engChrName: I remember them glarin' up at me—before I closed 'em for good.
engSearchText:
I remember them glarin' up at me—before I closed
'em for good.
jpnChrName: 死ぬ間際まで我を見上げておったわ。
jpnSearchText: 死ぬ間際まで我を見上げておったわ。

engChrName: That's enough. I'm going to end this battle in one stroke...
engSearchText:
That's enough. I'm going to end this battle in
one stroke...
jpnChrName: 御託はいい。 そろそろ仕舞いにしよう──
jpnSearchText:
御託はいい。
そろそろ仕舞いにしよう──

engChrName: ...with this!
engSearchText: ...with this!
jpnSearchText: 秘剣────

engChrName: Heh. Your pops used that move against me...
engSearchText: Heh. Your pops used that move against me...
jpnChrName: やはり父の技を受け継いでいるか。
jpnSearchText: やはり父の技を受け継いでいるか。

engChrName: ...and it didn't leave its mark! History's just gonna repeat itself!
engSearchText:
...and it didn't leave its mark! History's just gonna
repeat itself!
jpnChrName: だが無駄よ！　同じ剣は通じぬわ……！
jpnSearchText: だが無駄よ！　同じ剣は通じぬわ……！

engChrName: That's where you're wrong. I've refined my father's ultimate technique—and taken it to heights he could've only dreamed of!
engSearchText:
That's where you're wrong. I've refined my father's
ultimate technique—and taken it to heights he
could've only dreamed of!
jpnChrName: フッ、同じ剣だと？ この剣は父が夢見た頂に届いている。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、同じ剣だと？
この剣は父が夢見た頂に届いている。

engChrName: Taste our might—the might of two generations of masters!
engSearchText:
Taste our might—the might of two generations
of masters!
jpnChrName: 二代に渡る研鑽、その身で味わえ──
jpnSearchText: 二代に渡る研鑽、その身で味わえ──

engChrName: Divine Dragon Helix!
engSearchText: Divine Dragon Helix!
jpnChrName: 黄龍螺旋斬ッ……！！
jpnSearchText: 黄龍螺旋斬ッ……！！

engChrName: Connor is a young boy born to a very poor family.
engSearchText: Connor is a young boy born to a very poor family.
jpnChrName: 主人公【コナー】は、貧しい家庭に生まれた少年。
jpnSearchText: <C1>主人公【コナー】は、貧しい家庭に生まれた少年。

engChrName: After working themselves to the bone and saving money for their beloved son, his parents take him on a trip to Crossbell.
engSearchText:
After working themselves to the bone and saving
money for their beloved son, his parents take him on
a trip to Crossbell.
jpnChrName: ある日、息子のためにと奮発した両親に連れられ、 クロスベル自治州へ旅行に赴く。
jpnSearchText:
ある日、息子のためにと奮発した両親に連れられ、
クロスベル自治州へ旅行に赴く。

engChrName: It was there that they bought him a plushie of the independent state's marvelous mascot: Mishy.
engSearchText:
It was there that they bought him a plushie of the
independent state's marvelous mascot: Mishy.
jpnChrName: そこで彼はマスコットキャラクター【みっしぃ】の ぬいぐるみを買ってもらった。
jpnSearchText:
そこで彼はマスコットキャラクター【みっしぃ】の
ぬいぐるみを買ってもらった。

engChrName: Through some mysterious magic, the Mishy plush gains a mind of its own, allowing it to speak with Connor.
engSearchText:
Through some mysterious magic, the Mishy plush
gains a mind of its own, allowing it to speak
with Connor.
jpnChrName: 不思議なことに、その【みっしぃ】は自我を持ち 【コナー】に話しかけてきた。
jpnSearchText:
不思議なことに、その【みっしぃ】は自我を持ち
【コナー】に話しかけてきた。

engChrName: Mishy's sole dream is to wear clothing and live like a normal human being. However, in order to achieve his dream, he must first grant a human's wish.
engSearchText:
Mishy's sole dream is to wear clothing and live like a
normal human being. However, in order to achieve
his dream, he must first grant a human's wish.
jpnChrName: 【みっしぃ】の夢は、服を着て人間になること── 服を揃えるには、人間の夢を叶える必要があるらしい。
jpnSearchText:
【みっしぃ】の夢は、服を着て人間になること──
服を揃えるには、人間の夢を叶える必要があるらしい。

engChrName: Connor, more than happy to be the wish-bearer, promises to get Mishy a full set of clothes. Overjoyed, Mishy grants his wish without a second thought.
engSearchText:
Connor, more than happy to be the wish-bearer,
promises to get Mishy a full set of clothes. Overjoyed,
Mishy grants his wish without a second thought.
jpnChrName: こうして【みっしぃ】は【コナー】の夢を叶え、 【コナー】は【みっしぃ】に服を与えるようになった。
jpnSearchText:
こうして【みっしぃ】は【コナー】の夢を叶え、
【コナー】は【みっしぃ】に服を与えるようになった。

engChrName: In return, Connor gives Mishy a shirt, a pair of pants, and some spare socks. The last thing Mishy needed to become human was two long boots.
engSearchText:
In return, Connor gives Mishy a shirt, a pair of pants,
and some spare socks. The last thing Mishy needed to
become human was two long boots.
jpnChrName: やがて、あとは長靴を残すのみとなった時……
jpnSearchText: <C1>やがて、あとは長靴を残すのみとなった時……

engChrName: But just as his dream was on the cusp of realization, Connor had a thought. A very selfish thought. 'It's kinda convenient to have Mishy around.'
engSearchText:
But just as his dream was on the cusp of realization,
Connor had a thought. A very selfish thought.
'It's kinda convenient to have Mishy around.'
jpnChrName: 【コナー】は【みっしぃ】の “利用価値”に気づいてしまったのだった。
jpnSearchText:
【コナー】は【みっしぃ】の
“利用価値”に気づいてしまったのだった。

engChrName: It worked just like you said! I won the Z1 car model from the sweepstakes! You're the best, Mishy!
engSearchText:
It worked just like you said! I won the Z1 car model
from the sweepstakes! You're the best, Mishy!
jpnChrName: すごいよみっしぃ！　君の言う通り懸賞に応募したら、 今度はＺ１カーの模型が当たったよ！
jpnSearchText:
すごいよみっしぃ！　君の言う通り懸賞に応募したら、
今度はＺ１カーの模型が当たったよ！

engChrName: Meeheehee! What did I tell you, Connor?! You're my bestest friend in the whole wide world! I'd do anything to see you smile!
engSearchText:
Meeheehee! What did I tell you, Connor?! You're my
bestest friend in the whole wide world! I'd do
anything to see you smile!
jpnChrName: みししっ、コナーくんは親友だからネ！ 喜ぶ顔が見たくて頑張っちゃったヨ☆
jpnSearchText:
みししっ、コナーくんは親友だからネ！
喜ぶ顔が見たくて頑張っちゃったヨ☆

engChrName: So how about getting me those mee-hee-arvolous boots now, huh? Then I can become a real human! We can go on walks and dance till the sun goes down!
engSearchText:
So how about getting me those mee-hee-arvolous
boots now, huh? Then I can become a real human!
We can go on walks and dance till the sun goes down!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、今度こそ長靴をくれるんだよネ！ ボク、靴を履いてコナー君と歩くのが夢なんだぁ☆
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、今度こそ長靴をくれるんだよネ！
ボク、靴を履いてコナー君と歩くのが夢なんだぁ☆

engChrName: Shut up. Just keep your mouth shut and grant me more wishes.
engSearchText:
Shut up. Just keep your mouth shut and grant me
more wishes.
jpnChrName: ウザッ……いいから黙って夢叶えてろよ。
jpnSearchText: ウザッ……いいから黙って夢叶えてろよ。

engChrName: Mee-huh?
engSearchText: Mee-huh?
jpnChrName: えっ……？
jpnSearchText: えっ……？

engChrName: Oh, uh... Sorry, buddy! I don't know if my monthly allowance can cover the cost of those boots. Just wait a little longer, okay?
engSearchText:
Oh, uh... Sorry, buddy! I don't know if my monthly
allowance can cover the cost of those boots. Just wait a
little longer, okay?
jpnChrName: あー、悪いけどお小遣いが足りないんだよね。 だから長靴を買うのはもうちょっと待ってよ！
jpnSearchText:
あー、悪いけどお小遣いが足りないんだよね。
だから長靴を買うのはもうちょっと待ってよ！

engChrName: Here, let me get you some socks to hold you over!
engSearchText: Here, let me get you some socks to hold you over!
jpnChrName: その代わりに靴下をあげるからさ！
jpnSearchText: その代わりに靴下をあげるからさ！

engChrName: So you're breaking your promise. I understand now. You're nothing more than a greedy piece of trash who's trying to get a wishy at the expense of Mishy.
engSearchText:
So you're breaking your promise. I understand now.
You're nothing more than a greedy piece of trash
who's trying to get a wishy at the expense of Mishy.
jpnChrName: ……“ヤクソク”が違うよね。 所詮は君も、我欲に溺れるクズだったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
……“ヤクソク”が違うよね。
所詮は君も、我欲に溺れるクズだったんだ。

engChrName: Begone, worthless human. I'd make a MUCH better one than you.
engSearchText:
Begone, worthless human. I'd make a MUCH better
one than you.
jpnChrName: ボクよりも人間でいる価値、無いよね。
jpnSearchText: ボクよりも人間でいる価値、無いよね。

engChrName: Huh? H-Hey, what're you...?! S-Stop it! I thought we were the bestest fr—
engSearchText:
Huh? H-Hey, what're you...?! S-Stop it! I thought we
were the bestest fr—
